snippet: Prime Minister Manuel Valls is more centrist on social issues, more conservative economically and more combative than President François Hollande, who appointed him.
abstract: French Prime Min Manuel Valls offers detailed summary to National Assembly of how the government will enact $69 billion in spending cuts by 2017; introduces his particular brand of Socialist Party politics, proving himself to be more centrist on social issues, more conservative economically and more combative than Pres Francois Hollande, who appointed him.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Manuel Valls is more centrist on social issues, more conservative economically and more combative than President François Hollande, who appointed him.

headline.main: In French Premier’s Blend of Socialism, Conservative and Centrist Notes
headline.print_headline: Conservative and Centrist Notes in French Premier’s Blend of Socialism
